backend/main.mo: Defines core types for videos, quizzes, settings, admin config, and stores them in maps with basic comparison utilities and authorization/storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence for a republish/redeploy task, mapping relevant frontend files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for major frontend components, hooks, and utilities across the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and utility layers plus CSS variable themes for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with guarded account/admin routes, theme provider, profile setup modal, and toaster.
frontend/src/components/admin/Categories: Admin UI to list, add, and delete video categories with confirmation dialogs and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/admin/DashboardV: Form for admins to edit dashboard visual settings and submit updates via backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/DonationLi: Provides a form to view and update the site's donation link using settings data and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/HomeConten: Dialog-based editor for updating home page text fields, loading current settings and submitting updates.
frontend/src/components/admin/HomepageVi: Form for customizing homepage visuals, including hero background, overlay settings, and optional image upload with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/admin/LogoUpload: Allows uploading, previewing, removing, and saving a custom site logo using ExternalBlob uploads.
frontend/src/components/admin/QuizEditor: Editor dialog for creating or updating quizzes, supporting video selection and dynamic question and answer management.
frontend/src/components/admin/QuizzesMan: Displays all quizzes with options to create, edit, or delete quizzes, integrating QuizEditor and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/ThemeSetti: Form allowing admins to view and update primary and secondary theme colors, syncing with backend settings and showing success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserManage: Displays all users with anonymized identifiers and lets admins update each user's status via a select control.
frontend/src/components/admin/VideoEdito: Modal dialog for creating or editing videos, handling title, category, URL, thumbnail upload, and saving via backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/VideosMana: Lists all videos with thumbnails and provides controls to add, edit, or delete videos using dialogs and confirmation prompts.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Simple screen showing an access denied message with an option to return to the home page.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button handling login and logout using Internet Identity, updating query cache and showing appropriate states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to create a profile with name and optional email before continuing.
frontend/src/components/donations/PostQu: Post-quiz popup showing the user's score and offering a donation link pulled from admin settings.
frontend/src/components/donations/ShowSo: Button that opens the configured donation link if available, styled with theme-based gradient colors.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeContent: Displays homepage hero text with optional admin editing via HomeContentEditor.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Renders site footer with branding and a caffeine.ai credit link.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Shows site header with navigation, logo, auth buttons, and admin links when applicable.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps pages with header, footer, theme loading, and layout structure.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Lead: Fetches and displays the top 5 leaderboard results with anonymized usernames.
frontend/src/components/quizzes/QuizTaki: Handles quiz answering, submission, scoring, and post-quiz donation modal.
frontend/src/components/quizzes/VideoQui: Loads quizzes for a video and allows selecting and taking a quiz.
frontend/src/components/videos/VideoCard: Renders a video with YouTube embed parsing and optional quizzes for authenticated users.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, handling access control initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Provides authentication state, admin status, and user profile using the actor and queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication and manages identity loading, login, and logout states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating settings, videos, categories, and related backend data using an actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Applies theme colors from settings to CSS variables and exposes the current theme.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines light and dark mode CSS variables for colors and layout.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Displays a user's quiz results with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard with tabs for managing videos, categories, quizzes, users, appearance, and homepage content.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the home page using settings data, applying hero visuals, category grouping, and fallback behaviors.
frontend/src/utils/color.ts: Provides hex color validation, hex-to-RGB conversion, and a clamp utility.
frontend/src/utils/privacy.ts: Creates a short anonymized user label based on an identifier.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read, store, and clear URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animation.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the current fix request, known issues, and existing features for build state management.
